title: Prometheus Rising
description: Prometheus Rising by Robert Anton Wilson is a guide book of "how to get from here to there", an amalgam of Timothy Leary&#039;s 8-circuit model of consciousness, Gurdjieff&#039;s self-observation exercises, Alfred Korzybski&#039;s general semantics, Aleister Crowley&#039;s magical theorems, Sociobiology, Yoga, Christian Science, relativity, and quantum mechanics amongst other approaches to understanding the world around us. It claims to be a short book (nearly 300 pages) about how the human mind works and how to get the most use from one. Wilson describes it as an "owner&#039;s manual for the human brain".
